item.title: S&P 500 Earnings Revisions Hit Highest Positive Momentum Since 2021: What's Behind This Rising Bullish Sentiment Among Executives?
item.description: Upward earnings revisions for the S&P 500, tracked by the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust, are now the most positive they've been since 2021. read more

item.title: Tesla Records 13.4K New Registrations In China From August 4-10, July Sales Down 12%
item.description: Tesla saw a 71% jump in registrations last week, but overall sales are down 11% YoY. European and Chinese sales also declined. read more
